definitions.definition: something that is part of a list or group of things:
examples: the last item on the list

definitions.definition: one of several subjects to be considered:
examples: There are three items on the agenda.

definitions.definition: a piece of news on television or radio, or in a newspaper:
examples: There's an interesting item on the back page.
Buyers from stores are given the opportunity to go through fashion collections item by item and place orders.
